plugins.name: Style Match
plugins.description:
Link matching styles of selected elements and the styles in your library


Work with all Figma style types: Fill, Stroke, Text, Effects, Layout grid



For example, a Color style named Primary with a color #0D99FF is in the library, this plugin will find and apply/link Primary to all elements with color #0D99FF, so you don't have to do it manually.


Use case

  1. When you pick a color using Eyedropper, you always get HEX color, even if the color is already in the library. Link it back to the matching style in the library.
  2. Retroactively apply design system to existing design.
  3. Unlink styles of external libraries when you copy elements from shared files, then relink them to your local library.


Limitations

  1. It only works with "Local styles", it doesn't work with Library or Variables for now.
  2. Component instances are skipped.
  3. Text styles are very tricky as any difference in line hight, letter spacing etc prevents it from been matched.
  4. Occasionally Figma returns linked style that doesn't exist to plugin, try "Unlink" first then "Apply" again.

accepted.name: linterface
accepted.description:
Design, dev, product and more
(dedicated profile for publishing)

plugins.tagline: Apply matching styles from library

plugins.name: Asphalt - Color Grading (based on USWDS)
plugins.description:
Use this plugin to check the grade point for any color using its HEX value. It can also be used to get a list of suggested colors for a desired grade point.


How to use:

  • Input the HEX codes for the Foreground color.
  • Pick the desired grade you want a suggested shade in (optional)
  • Hit "Generate"


⚠️ For dark mode tokens, choose the desired grade in reverse, not from 0 but from 100. For example, the desired grade is 30 in light mode. It is five levels from 0. For dark mode, choose the fifth level from 100, which is 60.


This is based on the USWDS system of grading colors. With the help of 'magic numbers', you can use this system to ensure an accessible palette.


For any queries/feedback/suggestions feel free to leave a comment and we'll be happy to connect! 🚀

accepted.name: Asphalt Design System
accepted.description: This is the official page for Gojek Interaction Design team

accepted.name: Keith Vaz
accepted.description: Design Systems

plugins.tagline: Grade any color with ease while being WCAG compliant!

plugins.name: AI Dev for Ant Design
plugins.description:
Generate Ant Design React code for your Figma components in seconds

AI Dev for Ant Design is a Figma plugin that transforms your Figma components or images into ready-to-use Ant Design React code.


Learn more on our website


How It Works

1. Select a simple component in your Figma file.

2. Optionally, provide additional context about the component. For example: "Dropdown menu should include items: View, Edit, Delete."

3. Click "Generate React Code".

4. Copy the generated code to your clipboard.

5. Paste the code into your React project.


Optimizing Components for Best Results

As the plugin is in beta, you may encounter occasional bugs or discrepancies. Follow these tips to achieve optimal results:

1. Break down complex UIs: Instead of processing entire app screens, generate code for individual UI sections (e.g., header, content area cards, table, charts) separately.

2. Provide detailed context: Include extra details when necessary. For instance, specify the items to be included in a dropdown menu.

3. Wrap your component in Frame: When generating code for components, place them in a Figma frame with a gray background and 80-pixel padding. The AI will provide a component with better structure when it sees the component boundaries.

4. Image quality: If you use images, ensure they are of good quality before generating the code.

By following these guidelines, you can enhance the accuracy and usefulness of the generated React code.


---


You can test the plugin on five components/images for free. You will need to purchase credits to use it on more components. The plugin uses Anthropic’s Claude 3.5 Sonnet. Large-language models cost quite a bit of money to run. We must cover our costs to grow the plugin sustainably without compromising our service quality.

accepted.name: Matt Wierzbicki
accepted.description: Product designer and entrepreneur running multiple projects.

plugins.tagline: AI-Powered React Code Generation for Ant Design Components

plugins.name: 24Stream
plugins.description:
24Stream plugin helps to create rich-content for product cards, which is intended to be broadcasted to online sellers and marketplaces.

The plugin allows you to unify the layout and then automatically make the layout design in HTML, as well as to package in the E-package format - which is designed to exchange rich content between online sellers and marketplaces.

With the help of the plugin you can choose an existing design of the features, integrate it into your layout, make all necessary changes using the entire arsenal of Figma to work on layouts or create your own collection on the site with 24streamConverter and use it.

To convert your design to layout, you need to go to 24StreamConverter website, log in to your personal account via Figma and choose the necessary layout for conversion.

To access the plugin, you need to enter the key that you can get by writing to klimov@24ttl.ru.

plugins.name: figmark
plugins.description:
This is a plugin that allows you to bookmark your favorite objects.

You can bookmark components you see frequently and find them quickly.


usage

Select the component and click the plus button.

You can change the order by dragging.

Use the directional keys to toggle the selection.

You can change the name, and even delete it.

This is similar to Figma's operation.

Bookmarks are managed on a project-by-project basis.


Data cannot be shared between the browser version and the desktop version.

Batch Font Replacer is a powerful Figma plugin that enables designers to quickly swap fonts, bringing creativity to life. Compatible with both Figma and FigJam, it ensures brand consistency and cohesive design styles with ease.


2. Efficient Font Replacement

No matter the project size, Batch Font Replacer lets you batch replace fonts swiftly, from selected elements to the entire file, streamlining your design process.


3. Practical Features & Customization

Batch Font Replacer provides robust features like quick search, missing font replacement, and local style application, enabling designers to make precise adjustments with ease.


4. Creative Freedom & Missing Font Detection

Batch Font Replacer makes font changes effortless, enhancing creative freedom while ensuring design completeness with missing font detection.


Do you need to support Mixed Text? Feel free to leave a comment and let me know

plugins.name: Visual Usability Checker
plugins.description:
AI-powered visual usability insights directly in Figma. Design confidently, iterate faster, launch effectively.


Instant Visual Hierarchy Analysis

Discover what grabs attention first. Our AI predicts where users will look, empowering you to perfect your design before launch.


Effortless Comparison of Design Variations

Rapidly validate multiple layouts side by side. Clearly identify the design version that best guides viewer attention.


Data-Driven Design Decisions

Replace guesswork with actionable data. Confidently optimize your designs using clear, visual insights provided by AI.


Advanced Analytics Made Simple:

  1. Focus Map: Quickly verify essential elements are noticeable within the critical first 3–5 seconds.
  2. Focus Score: Immediately gauge visual clarity—high scores confirm strong visual hierarchy, low scores indicate scattered focus.
  3. Attention Hotspots: Identify elements that most significantly impact visual hierarchy and viewer attention.


Early Access Advantages:

  1. Exclusive early access to new plugin features.
  2. Direct influence over feature development—your feedback shapes the plugin.
  3. Dedicated human support ready to assist.

plugins.name: Korean iOS Syst’em All
plugins.description:
This plugin automatically converts fonts in Text layers to Korean characters in Apple SD Gothic and English letters, numbers, and special characters in SF Pro, similar to the Korean iOS system fonts. It calculates and applies the corresponding values to maintain the same font weight. As of 2023, it uses the latest iOS font, SF Pro, and requires downloading and installing the font from Apple's official site for operation.

Additionally, SF Pro is configured to detect the font size and automatically apply the unique letter spacing values characteristic of iOS.

https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/typography#iOS-iPadOS-visionOS-tracking-values


-----


이 플러그인은 Text 레이어를 한국어 iOS시스템 폰트처럼 한글은 Apple SD Gothic으로, 영문, 숫자, 특수문자는 SF Pro로, 같은 두께에 해당하는 값을 자동으로 계산하여 변환해 줍니다. 2023년 기준 최신 iOS폰트인 SF Pro가 사용되며, 작동을 위해서는 애플 공식 사이트를 통한 폰트의 다운로드 및 설치가 필요합니다.


추가로, 이 때 SF Pro는 폰트의 사이즈를 감지하여 iOS에서의 고유한 자간값으로 자동 적용되도록 설정되어 있습니다.

https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/typography#iOS-iPadOS-visionOS-tracking-values

accepted.name: Heetaek Woo
accepted.description: Working at NAVER Corp.

plugins.tagline: Converts Figma Text layer fonts to a mix of Apple SD Gothic and SF Pro.

plugins.name: XAuto
plugins.description:
Auto Layout Presets:


  • Horizontal
  • Vertical
  • Stretch Horizontal
  • Stretch Vertical
  • Space Between Horizontal
  • Space Between Vertical
  • Toggle Direction


All presets are available as plugin parameters and individual menu items so you can create shortcuts that suit you.


Frame Alignment


Change your frame alignment quick as a flash by assigning custom short cuts rather than using the standard Figma UI.


If you have a full size keyboard try assigning Cmd + Option and the numbers on the numpad.


Padding and Spacing Panel


Try assigning a shortcut like `Ctrl + Shift + A` to quickly access frame padding and spacing options.


How To Use Presets


  1. Select the items you want to apply a preset to. If the items are not already in a frame, XAuto will create a parent frame for you.
  2. Apply preset via the plugin parameters or menu
  3. Profit


Playground


After installing the XAuto plugin I highly recommend downloading the XAuto Playground community file and try it out.

plugins.name: Variables to JSON Tokens for ZeroHeight
plugins.description:
This tool is made to respect the W3C Design Token formatting (draft) and be compatible with the Importing system of Zero Height.


The plugin has 2 commands:

  • Generating/Exporting the variales into a JSON file
  • Importing existing Tokens into Variables


The first one works, the second one is a proposition made by Figma in its demo file. I kept it but didn't improve/test it.


This plugin has been made for a personal use, but I hope it can be useful to you to. This plugin is not sponsored or supported (yet?) by the Zero Height company.


Follow me for more plugins and files 💕

plugins.name: Artwork Flow Brand Assistant
plugins.description:
About Artwork Flow

Artwork Flow is an intelligent creative operations platform that allows designers, marketing teams, and brands to create, store, manage, and publish data-backed creatives at scale within minutes. Using Artwork Flow, businesses can maximize their campaign ROI with accelerated creative production, streamlined tasks and workflows, actionable creative insights, an intuitive asset library, and automated brand compliance.


Why choose Artwork Flow’s Brand Assistant on Figma?

Artwork Flow allows brands to store their brand guidelines, elements, and other assets on a smart digital asset management system while helping users streamline their creative operations with flexible workflows.

With Artwork Flow’s Brand Assistant, you can import any assets stored on Artwork Flow, including images and brand assets like logos, colours, and fonts. You can also complete any pending upload tasks on Artwork Flow by uploading assets directly from Figma.


To get started with Artwork Flow:

  1. Sign up for Artwork Flow: https://bit.ly/AFxFigma
  2. Upload your brand guidelines and assets to Artwork Flow.
  3. Install Brand Assistant on Figma and simplify your creative operations.
plugins.tagline: Access all your brand assets on Artwork Flow and update your tasks through Figma.

plugins.name: Feedback Flow
plugins.description:
English version is below.



🔌 どんなプラグイン？


Feedback Flowは、Figma上のコメントを確認しながらTODOリストを作成できるプラグインです。


複数人でデザイン作業を行っていると、コメントでやり取りをすることがあると思います。そしてコメントで依頼された修正を行うといったケースは誰しもが経験しているのではないでしょうか？

そんなときに、このプラグインを利用すれば、コメントからTODOを作成することができます。

まずはコメントからやらなくてはいけないTODOを書き起こして、TODOリストを見ながら修正を行っていくと、やらなくてはいけないことが漏れなくできるようになります。



🔧 使い方


コメントから「タスクに追加」を選択すると、そのコメントがタスクに追加されます。

タスクリストでは完了/未完了のステータス管理、順番の並べかえが可能です。



⏱️ こんなときにおすすめ


コメントを一覧形式で確認できます。一覧形式で確認できるのはこのプラグインだけです。

また、コメントからタスクを起こせます。


ぜひ、このプラグインを利用して作業効率を上げ、クリエイティブな作品を作り上げてください。

Feedback Flowは、デスクワークブランド「NERY」が提供するプラグイン#100シリーズの第六弾になります！



📝 プラグイン機能のご要望・ご意見をお聞かせください


https://forms.gle/uikQFTa4TeX94nBp9



💼 NERYとは？


NERYは、FigmaとChromeのプラグインを開発・提供するデスクワークブランドです。



🚀 プラグイン#100シリーズとは？


プラグイン#100シリーズは、FigmaとGoogle Chromeのユーザー向けに、100個のプラグインをリリースするプロジェクトです。


このプロジェクトでは、クリエイターのニーズに応じたプラグインを開発し、デザイン作業をより便利かつ効率的に行えるようにサポートします。


プロジェクトは、企画から開発まですべてを行うのではなく、途中段階のものを皆様にお見せし、フィードバックをいただくことで、プラグインの機能拡充や新たな製品開発につなげます。


皆様の声がプラグインの開発に反映されることで、より使いやすく、より魅力的なFigmaとChromeを実現するために、皆様のご支援をお願いいたします。



🏢 開発会社


株式会社アジケ

https://ajike.co.jp/



===


🔌 What kind of plugin is it?


Feedback Flow is a plugin that allows you to create a to-do list while reviewing comments on Figma.


When working on design with multiple people, you might find yourself exchanging information through comments. I'm sure everyone has experienced scenarios where they've had to make adjustments requested in comments, haven't they?

In such situations, this plugin allows you to create to-dos from these comments.

First, write down the to-dos from the comments, then proceed with making the required adjustments while viewing the to-do list. This way, you can ensure that no tasks are overlooked.



🔧 How to use


When you select 'Add to Task' from a comment, that comment gets added to your tasks. Within the task list, you can manage the status of tasks as completed or incomplete, and you can rearrange the order of the tasks.



⏱️ Recommended for times like these


You can review comments in a list format, a feature unique to this plugin. Furthermore, you can create tasks from these comments.


Please take advantage of this plugin to improve your work efficiency and create creative pieces. Feedback Flow is the sixth installment in the Plugin #100 Series provided by the deskwork brand 'NERY'!



📝 Please give us your feedback on the plugin features.


https://forms.gle/uikQFTa4TeX94nBp9



💼 What is NERY?


NERY is a deskwork brand that develops and provides plugins for Figma and Chrome.



🚀 What is the Plugin #100 Series?


The Plugin #100 Series is a project to release 100 plugins for Figma and Google Chrome users.


In this project, we will develop plugins that meet the needs of creators and support them to make design work more convenient and efficient.


We will not perform all the planning and development of the project, but by showing you the intermediate stages and receiving feedback, we will continue to improve the functionality of the plugins and develop new products.


Your feedback will be reflected in the development of the plugin, so we ask for your support to realize a more user-friendly and attractive Figma and Chrome.



🏢 Developer


Ajike Co., Ltd.

https://ajike.co.jp/

accepted.name: NERY
accepted.description:
NERY is a project to release 100 plugins for Figma and Google Chrome users.
Please follow me.

plugins.tagline: The plugin can turn comments on Figma into a TODO list.

plugins.name: X-Sitemapper
plugins.description:
Transform your site planning process with the X-SiteMapper. Simply upload a CSV file, and watch as it automatically generates a clear, visual sitemap, perfect for planning and collaboration. Whether you’re designing a new website, auditing existing structures, or planning user journeys, this tool makes it easy to visualise site architecture and communicate your vision. Save time, reduce errors, and improve collaboration with this intuitive and efficient plugin.


Before uploading your CSV file, please ensure it meets the following criteria:


1. The file should contain only a single column with all URLs listed.

2. The top entry must be the root/home URL.

3. There should be no empty rows in the column.

4. Each URL must be a full URL (e.g., https://example.com/category1/page1) rather than a relative path (e.g., /category1/page1).


Once your CSV file is correctly structured, upload it to X-SiteMapper, and it will generate the sitemap for you.

- Each sitemap level will be created in a separate frame.

- The tool supports up to 5 levels of sub-pages.

- The frames are able to be viewed as a prototype that can expand and collapse the different levels of pages by clicking the “+” and “-” icons displayed next to the page names.


If you have any questions please feel free to reach out to sitemapper@vml.com
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly create interactive sitemaps from CSV files in seconds

Introducing Design System Visualizer Plugin, the game-changing Figma Plugin that empowers designers to effortlessly translate their brand's primary and secondary colors into a full set of Backbase tokens. Seamlessly integrated within Figma, this powerful tool revolutionizes the way Backbase customers bring their brand identities to life in Backbase products.


Gone are the days of manual token creation and tedious color matching. With Design System Visualizer Plugin, designers can unlock a world of possibilities, transforming their brand's colors into tangible, customizable tokens with just a few clicks.


How does it work? It's simple. Just input your brand's primary and secondary colors, and Design System Visualizer Plugin generates a comprehensive set of tokens that effortlessly reflect your brand identity. These tokens can be used across Backbase projects, ensuring a consistent and cohesive user experience that resonates with your audience.


Elevate your design workflow and transform colors into tokens with Design System Visualizer Plugin. Unleash your brand's potential and create captivating digital experiences that leave a lasting impact. Get started today and witness the power of seamless integration between Figma and Backbase.

Are you a designer who values accessibility and wants to ensure your designs are visually pleasing to all users? Look no further than Accessible Color Picker, a groundbreaking Figma plugin designed to revolutionize your color selection process. With its comprehensive features and user-friendly interface, this plugin will help you effortlessly achieve optimal color contrast ratios and create stunning designs that comply with WCAG 2.1 standards.

Let's delve into the remarkable features of Accessible Color Picker and discover how it can elevate your design workflow:

  1. Contrast Ratio Analysis: The plugin's first element provides instant feedback on the contrast ratio between two selected elements. It intuitively informs you whether the contrast meets the Target Contrast Ratio, allowing you to make informed decisions about color combinations. By ensuring your designs adhere to accessibility guidelines, you guarantee that users with visual impairments can comfortably read and engage with your content.
  2. Hex Color Code Adjustment: The second element of Accessible Color Picker takes color harmony to the next level. It presents a hex color code that shares the same hue and saturation as the foreground color but adjusts the lightness value precisely to align with the Target Contrast Ratio. This ingenious feature empowers you to effortlessly create color variations that not only look visually appealing but also maintain optimal accessibility standards.
  3. Live Color Simulation: Visualize your color choices in real-time with the third and fourth elements of the plugin. These elements display your selected foreground and background colors in actual context, allowing you to assess the readability and aesthetics of your design. Quickly iterate through different color combinations and find the perfect balance between style and accessibility.
  4. Customizable Target Contrast Ratio: Accessible Color Picker provides you with complete control over the Target Contrast Ratio. With the final component, an input field, you can easily adjust the ratio to meet the WCAG 2.1 guidelines defined by AA and AAA standards. Additionally, you can reduce the ratio to explore complementary color schemes and unlock a whole new world of design possibilities.

Why should you choose Accessible Color Picker for your Figma workflow? This plugin offers numerous benefits that will transform the way you design:

  • Enhance Accessibility: Ensure your designs are accessible to all users by effortlessly meeting WCAG 2.1 contrast ratio guidelines. Create inclusive experiences that prioritize readability and usability for everyone.
  • Streamline Color Selection: With real-time contrast ratio analysis and automatic hex color code adjustment, Accessible Color Picker simplifies the process of finding harmonious color combinations that meet accessibility standards.
  • Visualize Color Choices: Preview your color selections in context and fine-tune your designs until they achieve the perfect balance of aesthetics and readability. Save time and avoid costly revisions with this powerful visualization feature.
  • Unlock Design Possibilities: Experiment with different Target Contrast Ratios to explore complimentary color schemes and push the boundaries of your creativity. Accessible Color Picker opens up new avenues for unique and captivating design choices.

Don't compromise on accessibility or design excellence. Let Accessible Color Picker empower you to create visually stunning designs that leave no user behind. Add the plugin today and embark on a journey towards inclusive and captivating design experiences. Once added, simply launch the plugin and select any two Layers to get started!

plugins.name: Private Components
plugins.description:
Hide/Show all the private components in your file with one click.


In Design Systems adding a "_" or "." to the beginning of the name to hide components from libraries is a smart way to keep complex components separated from their smaller parts.

 

In some cases you'll also want to hide those secondary components from the design system user's eye so he doesn't get distracted with secondary information.

 

This plugin simply hides and shows all the private components for you.

plugins.name: Segoe Fluent Icons Search
plugins.description:
🚨 Font Required

This plugin requires Microsoft’s Segoe Fluent Icons font to display icons correctly. Without it, glyphs will appear as empty boxes (□).

  1. Windows 11: No action needed—the font is preinstalled.
  2. Windows 10 & macOS: Download the font from Microsoft for use in design and development.


🔎 Segoe Fluent Icons Search

Segoe Fluent Icons Search makes working with the Fluent icons font in Figma a breeze.

  1. Quickly search Microsoft’s Segoe Fluent Icons
  2. Click to copy any icon glyph
  3. Paste into text layers for seamless use
  4. includes 1,470+ glyphs


🙋 FAQs

► Can I use this with macOS?

  1. Yes! You just need to download Microsoft's Segoe Fluent Icons font and install it. If you're on Windows 10, you'll also need to download the font.

► I installed the font, but I'm still seeing "□" instead of glyphs.

  1. You'll need to restart Figma and relaunch the plugin due to font caching.

► Can I download the SVGs of these icons?

  1. No, not through Segoe Fluent Icons Search—this plugin only allows you to preview and copy individual glyphs.

► A few of the glyphs are still showing as empty boxes (□).

  1. A few glyphs are only available on Windows 11, and not included directly in the downloadable Segoe Fluent Icon font.


This plugin is open-source.

accepted.name: Seth Cottle
accepted.description:
✈️ Product Design Lead at CLEAR. 
👤 He/Him

plugins.tagline: Browse and copy glyphs from Microsoft’s Segoe Fluent Icons font.

plugins.name: VV-BOX
plugins.description:
这是一款设计师辅助工具，现功能有：


  1. 整理排序画板：用户可以设置上下和左右间距，插件会按照这些设定对全局画板进行排序和位置调整，最终实现画板从左到右、从上到下的有序排列；也可激活选取排序画板选项只对选取的画板进行排序，默认为关闭。
  2. 画板前缀命名：插件会对画板进行重命名，按照画板在页面的位置，如第一行的第一个画板会被命名为'101_原名'，第二行的第三个画板会被命名为'203_原名'。
  3. 全局字体替换：选中字体层，即可将文档中和选中字体层一样的全部字体进行替换（不局限于字号）。


后续会新增更多的实用小工具，敬请期待……


-----------------------------------------------------------------------


This is an auxiliary tool for designers, with current features including:


  1. Sort Frames: Users can set vertical and horizontal spacing, and the plugin will sort and reposition all frames accordingly, ultimately achieving an orderly layout of frames from left to right and top to bottom. There is also an option to sort only selected frames, which is turned off by default.
  2. Rename Frames: The plugin renames frames based on their position on the page. For example, the first frame in the first row will be renamed '101_OriginalName', and the third frame in the second row will be renamed '203_OriginalName'.
  3. Global Font Replacement: By selecting a text layer, you can replace all fonts in the document that match the selected text layer's font (not limited to font size).


More practical tools will be added in the future, so stay tuned...
plugins.tagline: 支持一键画板排序，一键添加画板前缀名，一键全局字体替换等功能；中英文界面切换，简单，好用。

plugins.name: Wonderflow
plugins.description:
Wonderflow organises your document into tidy numbered flows.


  • Choose frames to sort, and Wonderflow weaves its magic to organise, rename, and number them in an instant.
  • Drag and drop frames between any two frames for a quick switcheroo. Wonderflow will reorder the flow and update everything for you.
  • Tweak the spacing between flow frames and rows, and optionally align them all on the canvas, channeling your inner perfectionist.


You can update spacing and alignment without having to select any frames, but if you want to create a new flow or update the name of an existing flow, you will need to select the frames you want to affect.


See more details

plugins.name: Figma to css and html by plantcss | Figma to code
plugins.description:
Description

Convert Figma design layers properties and values to HTML and CSS values for Frontend and Web UI Development. This plugin is developed from UI engineer perspective. This plugin main concept is reduce conversion time of convert Figma design to webpage development. So, this plugin is very useful for if your beginner or expert.


Features

  1. Support all text properties ( font-family, font-size, color and so on ) except transform values.
  2. Figma blend mode to CSS mix-blend-mode
  3. Export all type of Figma design gradient to CSS gradient values, It is also in the border.
  4. Different text properties in same line of text, it shows individual values to each.
  5. Figma filter blur and backdrop blur to CSS filter blur
  6. Figma drop and inner shadow to CSS box shadow
  7. Text border both solid and gradient colors convert to CSS.
  8. Plugin window resize option available. So, you can change the size plugin window size for a better work experience.
  9. Dark theme and Light theme support
  10. Quickly run the plugin with the help of shortcut plugin run button.


How to use plugin

  1. Just run the plugin
  2. After successfully plugin run, select any layer, you wish to convert.
  3. Selected design layer properties and values converted quickly and shown immediately.
  4. Select the code and copy values, to paste where you want.


Limitations

In case if some CSS properties not available for the current version, it will added future release versions. For a current version CSS codes only available, HTML code will be added later.


Drop your comment and share to other designer and developers.
plugins.tagline: Convert Figma design to css and html code for frontend development

plugins.name: Fix Detached Instances
plugins.description:
Fix Detached Instances plugin helps you find and reattach detached instances. It lists all detached instances in the file and allows you to easily locate them. Reattach them to the original main component one by one or in bulk. Any changes you made to the detached instances would be preserved as overrides where possible. For more details check documentation. Support: gleb@dominate.design


→ Get unlimited license

Fix Detached Instances + Master plugin


Free trial allows you to attach 5 instances for free. This plugin goes hand in hand with Master plugin in the daily workflow so both plugins are purchased together as a bundle. Get Master license and enjoy unlimited usage of both plugins.


How to deal with detached instances

When you find a detached instance, there are two approaches you could take to bring your design back to consistency: restore the instance or extend the component. Using Master and Fix Detached Instances plugins you can choose which approach to take.


1. Reattach: use Fix Detached Instances plugin to restore the instance back to the original state without losing overrides. In order to preserve overrides, make sure the detached instance has the same layer order and hierarchy as the original main component.


2. Extend: find the detached instance using Fix Detached Instances and use Master → New Component from Objects feature in order to create a new component from it. Then simply move the newly created component to the variant set together with the original component.


Support contact: gleb@dominate.design
plugins.tagline: Find and reattach detached instances without losing overrides

plugins.name: ASCII Punk
plugins.description:
Bring creativity to your designs with ASCII Punk! This Figma plugin transforms any image into fully customizable ASCII art, giving your visuals a unique and artistic edge. Whether you're experimenting with image effects or crafting standout designs, ASCII Punk is here to inspire.


Why Use ASCII Punk?


  1. Custom Backgrounds: Change the background color to complement your design.
  2. Adjustable Precision: Resize character size to get the perfect level of detail.
  3. Personalized Characters: Choose your own set of ASCII characters to make your art unique.
  4. Export Type: Choose to export ASCII effect as either an image or a group of nodes.


Designed for creative professionals and enthusiasts alike, ASCII Punk is a versatile tool for adding personality to your designs. Try it today and discover new ways to reimagine your images!


Important Note:

  1. For node based export, the time to export depends based on number of nodes.
  2. It is better to not have huge number of nodes for better performance


Feedback & Support:

I'd love to see what you've created using this plugin! Feel free to tag me or say hi on X/Twitter (@HarshithAshvi). Your feedback and bug reports are always welcome 🙏


Contact:

Email: astroashvi@gmail.com

X/Twitter: https://x.com/HarshithAshvi
plugins.tagline: Image to ASCII Effect

Bring creativity to your designs with ASCII Punk! This Figma plugin transforms any image into fully customizable ASCII art, giving your visuals a unique and artistic edge. Whether you're experimenting with image effects or crafting standout designs, ASCII Punk is here to inspire.


Why Use ASCII Punk?


  1. Custom Backgrounds: Change the background color to complement your design.
  2. Adjustable Precision: Resize character size to get the perfect level of detail.
  3. Personalized Characters: Choose your own set of ASCII characters to make your art unique.
  4. Export Type: Choose to export ASCII effect as either an image or a group of nodes.


Designed for creative professionals and enthusiasts alike, ASCII Punk is a versatile tool for adding personality to your designs. Try it today and discover new ways to reimagine your images!


Important Note:

  1. For node based export, the time to export depends based on number of nodes.
  2. It is better to not have huge number of nodes for better performance


Feedback & Support:

I'd love to see what you've created using this plugin! Feel free to tag me or say hi on X/Twitter (@HarshithAshvi). Your feedback and bug reports are always welcome 🙏


Contact:

Email: astroashvi@gmail.com

X/Twitter: https://x.com/HarshithAshvi

plugins.name: Pixellink Variable Toolkit
plugins.description:
Unlock Figma's full potential with the Pixellink Toolkit, the ultimate solution for managing and applying variables directly within your designs. This dynamic design tool is crafted to seamlessly integrate into your Figma workflow, empowering designers with efficiency and precision. With Pixellink, you can effortlessly apply number variables for exact spacing, gaps, and fixed sizes and swiftly color assets with colour variables right in the viewport.


Designed for design customization and scalability, Pixellink enhances your creative workflow optimization, making quick style changes and theme management straightforward. Leverage this adaptive design setting tool for consistent, variable-driven design across your projects. Elevate your design process, harness the power of Figma's variables with Pixellink, and revolutionize your workflow for a productive and efficient design experience.
